title: Western Isles representative football team
text:
The Western Isles representative team is the representative <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> team for the <a href="Western%20Isles">Western Isles</a>, <a href="Scotland">Scotland</a>. They are not affiliated with <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a> or <a href="UEFA">UEFA</a>. Most players selected either play in the <a href="Lewis%20and%20Harris%20Football%20League">Lewis and Harris Football League</a> or the <a href="Uist%20%26amp%3B%20Barra%20Football%20League">Uist & Barra Football League</a>. The team has participated in several <a href="Island%20Games">Island Games</a> tournaments since 2005.
Island Games record.
1 Football was not played at the games due to lack of pitches in Gibraltar. A <a href="2019%20Inter%20Games%20Football%20Tournament">replacement tournament</a> was held in <a href="Anglesey">Anglesey</a> were the Western Isles came 9th.
